name: HyperBac Compressed Archive
summary: Learn about .HBC files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: HBC files can provide up to a 90% reduction in required storage space compared to the original uncompressed files.

description: Compressed file archive created with the HyperBac compression utility; used primarily for compressing database files; supported database systems include Oracle, SQL Server, MySQL, SharePoint, IBM DB/2, Sybase, and SAP BRBackup.
